unnormalised: Entertainment News: Guess who got chai spilled on their lehenga!
normalised: Entertainment News: Guess who got chai spilled on their lehenga!

unnormalised: Spilling the tea, folks! Looks like Bollywood's darling, Ananya Sharma, might be seeing someone new! Sources close to the actress spotted her leaving a fancy restaurant in Bandra last night with none other than Rohan Kapoor, star of the upcoming film "Desi Rockstar 2."
normalised: Spilling the tea, folks! Looks like Bollywood's darling, Ananya Sharma, might be seeing someone new! Sources close to the actress spotted her leaving a fancy restaurant in Bandra last night with none other than Rohan Kapoor, star of the upcoming film "Desi Rockstar two."

unnormalised: Now, Rohan's apparently fresh off his breakup with model Priya Verma, so this is HUGE. Witnesses say they were *really* close, giggling and whispering secrets. Drama, drama, drama!
normalised: Now, Rohan's apparently fresh off his breakup with model Priya Verma, so this is HUGE. Witnesses say they were *really* close, giggling and whispering secrets. Drama, drama, drama!

unnormalised: Adding fuel to the fire, Ananya was also seen sporting a diamond bracelet that looks suspiciously similar to one Rohan was showing off on his Instagram just last week. Coincidence? We think NOT!
normalised: Adding fuel to the fire, Ananya was also seen sporting a diamond bracelet that looks suspiciously similar to one Rohan was showing off on his Instagram just last week. Coincidence? We think NOT!

unnormalised: And get this – the rumour mill is buzzing that they both attended the IIT Delhi alumni meet a few weeks ago, even though neither of them actually studied there! Were they sneaking around then already?
normalised: And get this – the rumour mill is buzzing that they both attended the I I T Delhi alumni meet a few weeks ago, even though neither of them actually studied there! Were they sneaking around then already?

unnormalised: Could this be the new power couple of Bollywood? We're keeping our eyes peeled! More updates as we get them! Stay tuned, my darlings!
